byline.contributor: Deborah Sontag and Richard A. Oppel Jr. contributed reporting from Washington.

snippet: After a controversy over a racially charged name on a rock at a hunting lodge leased by Gov. Rick Perry, local residents said his critics were trying to dig up dirt to hurt his campaign.
lead_paragraph: After a controversy over a racially charged name on a rock at a hunting lodge leased by Gov. Rick Perry, local residents said his critics were trying to dig up dirt to hurt his campaign.

headline.main: In West Texas, Wagons Circle Around Perry
headline.print_headline: In West Texas, Wagons Circle Around Perry
headline.seo: In West Texas, Wagons Circle Around Perry Over Racially Charged Controversy
